properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 3:43AM EST until January 8 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Small Craft Advisory, expect sustained winds
up to 25 knots from the northwest with gusts up to 31 knots.
The largest significant waves will be 4 feet with a potential
maximum wave height of 5 feet. During the Gale Watch, expect
sustained winds up to 28 knots from the south with gusts up to
33 knots. The largest significant waves will be 7 feet with a
potential maximum wave height of 10 feet.

* WHERE...Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI and Port Sanilac to
Port Huron MI.

* WHEN...During the Small Craft Advisory, the maximum winds are
expected around 2 AM EST Wednesday with the largest waves
expected around 9 AM EST Wednesday. During the Gale Watch, the
maximum winds are expected around 2 PM EST Thursday with the
largest waves expected around 4 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
